creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: man wearing blue coat with green cuffs, tall black hat and glasses, with long white beard, carrying a walking stick and a bag labeled "MD", walking along a path with a "1 MILE" marker in LLC; personified tree at left; rolling farm landscape

provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
title: On the Road
